Title: Living Legend
Director: Vinton Heuck, Ciro Nieli, Frank Paur
Actors: Eric Loomis, Colleen O'Shaughnessey, Wally Wingert, Rick D. Wasserman
Plot: The Avengers discover the frozen body of Captain America and revive him, leading Baron Zemo to attack, seeking revenge against Cap for infecting him with Virus X.
